text: Irugur Junction (code: IGU) is a railway station located in Irugur, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. The station has two platforms and is a junction on the Coimbatore Junction-Erode Junction main line with branch line towards Mettupalayam. ==See also== *Railway stations in Coimbatore *Salem railway division *Coimbatore *Indian Railways *Transport in Coimbatore ==References== ==External links== * The official website of Southern railway Category:Railway junction stations in Tamil Nadu Category:Railway stations in Coimbatore Category:Salem railway division
title: Irugur Junction railway station
